name: Hackernews Client with Relay
description: Hacker news chrome extension written with react-relay stack.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:8080 https://localhost:8080 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:8080 https://localhost:8080 https://www.graphqlhub.com/graphql; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
